html:
10.3.21  10:34 pm   i'm really sad. what can i do about it? i feel lost and sad...

      how about some light exercise

10.3.21  10:22 pm   What's your favourite ice cream flavour

      hot

10.3.21  9:41 pm   thoughts on escapism

      the perfect remedy for entrapment

10.3.21  9:36 pm   what is your favorite emoji

      rectangle

10.3.21  9:23 pm   thoughts on being upside down?

      you'll get used to it

10.3.21  8:19 pm   Some people say we came from a simple life form. But I say why is the word 'simple' so complicated?

      because the person saying it is complicated

10.3.21  4:41 pm   any tips for playing bass really good

      love the song

10.3.21  1:08 pm   what's the opposite of infinity?

      nothing

10.3.21  1:05 pm   On a scale of 1 to 10, how weird is the universe?

      1

10.3.21  11:33 am   is your next song coming out soon?

      yes

10.3.21  10:57 am   how many sides per story

      as many as you need

10.3.21  10:33 am   Hey bill, I really love your music and your videos. I was wondering, since making the videos is probably the longest part of the process,

     gonna change that

     could you start releasing music with no video?

     i've been considering that as a last resort

     So we have more from you to enjoy while we wait for the next music video? I'm really craving some new music from you!

10.3.21  2:25 am   When will you put up more content on spotify?

      soon and often

10.3.21  12:08 am   Do you prefer using Roman numerals to mark you chords, or letters?

      for relative notation, i prefer arabic (nashville) numbers (1,2,3,4,5, etc). For absolute, i use letters (and numbers) (Amaj7, etc). Roman numerals are not easy for me to read

10.2.21  11:54 pm   I'm interested in writing music, but I'm not sure how to write something NEW because I feel like whatever I write will be too similar to songs already in existence. Any tips on writing unique music? Thanks!

      pretend you're trying to write something much worse than anything that's already been written. hopefully that will coax you into some more unique strategies

10.2.21  10:47 pm   why is complexity scary. why is simplicity scary. why is everything so scary

      because it's so real

10.2.21  10:43 pm   Any techniques to develop a good singing voice?

      enjoy it

10.2.21  8:58 pm   will your next vid be 2d or 3d?

      both

10.2.21  8:49 pm   why do you always capitalize the word "love"

      if you don't capitalize L it looks like l. which can be a problem if the L is in a prominent position where it's supposed to carry a lot of weight, and the content hinges upon the L being identified properly

10.2.21  6:30 pm   Are you smart?

      i don't know

10.2.21  5:27 pm   How does the Earth have such nice curves 😍 

      it's been spinning

10.2.21  3:36 pm   Do you still stand by your belief that the earth is about medium size?

      it depends where you put the camera

10.2.21  11:21 am   why are the dates in the "snogs" section messed up

      the only thing that sometimes messes it up is when takes more than 1 day to do things

10.2.21  10:35 am   Do you ever watch basketball games?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.2.21  10:13 am   Thoughts on emulation?

      too real

10.2.21  2:34 am   What is your favorite microtonal note?

      middle c

10.2.21  2:06 am   I wrote a couple of songs and I know how to play them and sing them and all that and now it's time to record them into the computer to edit them so I can send them to people and they can, you know, hear the songs. The problem is every time I think about doing the recording I just really don't want to. Just setting up all the equipment and then plugging everything in and doing the whole thing just sounds like so much effort. I've used the stuff a lot before, so it's not l am scared it will be confusing or anything, it's just that recording always sounds like so much work. Do you ever get like this? Am I just a lazy musician? How do I force myself to get it all done?

      invent an easier way

10.2.21  1:24 am   why do catholics eat fish on friday?

      if they happen to have it in stock

10.2.21  12:18 am   do you have any set goal that would mean changing your whole strategy at some point?

      i've been scrambling to find a strategy that works, for at least the last 15 years. i still haven't found one, unless this one i just found 2 days ago works

10.1.21  11:25 pm   What should i draw today?

      the whole calendar

10.1.21  11:20 pm   are you always on lsd

      no

10.1.21  10:53 pm   WHy do you say   "i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes"

      if it's true

10.1.21  10:03 pm   Are you strong? 

      yes, and weak

10.1.21  9:39 pm   was music discovered or invented

      both

10.1.21  6:48 pm   When I'm writing music, my favorites are always my songs with really simple chords and progressions, does that make me simple though

      no, its' the world that's simple

10.1.21  5:23 pm   thoughts on soap operas?

      possibly a simulation

10.1.21  2:33 pm   how to pull an all-nighter and bill, what do you consider an all-nighter to be?

      nothing. that phrase doesn't make sense to me

10.1.21  12:49 pm   do you like keyboards that make loud clicky clacky sounds?

      i like it when they click quietly

10.1.21  8:50 am   i don't have access to my midi keyboard (or any other instruments) for at least a couple more weeks (probably much longer), how can i make music things in the meantime? i think i will explode if i can't make music things for that long. or implode maybe.

      try to develop a writing system where you can write things down without the keyboard, as plans for what music to make when you have the keyboard

10.1.21  8:45 am   can you say something political

      i don't know anything political

10.1.21  8:39 am   If I turn my brain upside down does that change my thinking? 

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.1.21  8:12 am   can I use oranges instead of pumpkins for halloween?

      sure

10.1.21  6:12 am   Hey Bill! What's a good motto?

      "thanks that's very nice of you"

10.1.21  3:38 am   How to make pizza 

      just print it out

10.1.21  1:22 am   do you genuinely, honestly think you're a funny person yourself?

     everything is funny, mostly because of how serious everything is

     i think you are, but i want to know what you think

10.1.21  12:10 am   How can someone speak the language of atoms?

      think big
